name: Daredevil: Born Again
description: Matt Murdock returns as the blind lawyer and vigilante superhero Daredevil, continuing his fight against crime and corruption in Hell's Kitchen while balancing his dual identity.

episodes.title: Reborn
episodes.description: Matt Murdock returns to Hell's Kitchen to face new threats.

episodes.title: The Devil's Due
episodes.description: Daredevil confronts a new criminal organization.

episodes.title: Shadows of the Past
episodes.description: Matt's past comes back to haunt him.

name: Yellowstone
description: The Dutton family, led by patriarch John Dutton, controls the largest contiguous ranch in the United States, fighting to protect their land from developers, politicians, and neighboring communities in modern-day Montana.

episodes.title: Daybreak
episodes.description: John Dutton tries to protect his ranch and his family.

episodes.title: Kill the Messenger
episodes.description: The Duttons deal with a new threat to their land.

episodes.title: A Thundering
episodes.description: Season 2 premiere with new challenges for the Dutton family.

name: Reacher
description: Former military police investigator Jack Reacher drifts across America, solving crimes and dispensing his own brand of justice. Each season finds him in a new town facing dangerous mysteries and corrupt enemies.

episodes.title: Welcome to Margrave
episodes.description: Jack Reacher arrives in the small town of Margrave and gets arrested for murder.

episodes.title: First Dance
episodes.description: Reacher begins to investigate the murder he's accused of.

episodes.title: ATM
episodes.description: Reacher and his old military unit reunite.

name: MobLand
description: Two warring London crime families, the Harrigans and Stevensons, clash in a kill-or-be-killed battle. Harry Da Souza, a street-smart fixer, navigates the escalating conflict threatening both empires in this gritty British crime drama.

episodes.title: Blood and Territory
episodes.description: The war between the Harrigans and Stevensons begins.

episodes.title: The Fixer
episodes.description: Harry Da Souza tries to mediate between the families.

name: The Last of Us
description: A hardened survivor escorts a teenage girl across a post-apocalyptic America ravaged by a fungal infection that turns humans into zombie-like creatures, forming an unlikely bond along their dangerous journey.

episodes.title: When You're Lost in the Darkness
episodes.description: The outbreak begins and Joel's life changes forever.

episodes.title: Infected
episodes.description: Joel and Ellie encounter infected creatures on their journey.

name: The Walking Dead: Dead City
description: Maggie and Negan travel to zombie-infested Manhattan to rescue Hershel, who has been kidnapped and taken to the dangerous Dead City, forcing former enemies to work together for survival.

episodes.title: Old Acquaintances
episodes.description: Maggie and Negan form an unlikely alliance.

episodes.title: Who's There?
episodes.description: The duo enters the dangerous Manhattan.

name: The Eternaut
description: Based on the Argentine comic, this sci-fi series follows Juan Salvo and his neighbors as they fight for survival against an alien invasion that has devastated Buenos Aires with deadly snow.

episodes.title: The Snow
episodes.description: Deadly snow begins falling on Buenos Aires.

name: Arcane
description: Set in the League of Legends universe, this animated series explores the origins of champions Vi and Jinx as sisters caught on opposing sides of a conflict between the utopian city of Piltover and its underground Zaun.
genre: Animation, Sci-Fi & Fantasy, Drama, Action & Adventure

episodes.title: Welcome to the Playground
episodes.description: Vi and Jinx's story begins in the undercity.

episodes.title: Some Mysteries Are Better Left Unsolved
episodes.description: The sisters face the consequences of their actions.

episodes.title: Heavy is the Crown
episodes.description: Season 2 begins with new challenges.

name: Andor
description: A prequel to Rogue One, this Star Wars series follows Cassian Andor's journey from a petty thief to a rebel spy, exploring the formation of the Rebellion against the oppressive Galactic Empire.

episodes.title: Kassa
episodes.description: Cassian Andor's journey to becoming a rebel begins.

name: Franklin
description: A historical drama following Benjamin Franklin's diplomatic mission to France during the American Revolution, showcasing his wit, charm, and political maneuvering in securing crucial French support for American independence.

episodes.title: The Diplomat
episodes.description: Franklin arrives in France on a crucial mission.

name: Stranger Things
description: In 1980s small-town Indiana, a group of kids encounter supernatural forces and government conspiracies when their friend disappears into a mysterious alternate dimension called the Upside Down.

episodes.title: Chapter One: The Vanishing of Will Byers
episodes.description: Will Byers disappears in the small town of Hawkins.

episodes.title: Chapter Two: The Weirdo on Maple Street
episodes.description: The boys meet Eleven and learn about her powers.
